markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, there are these four meditators. What four?

One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in gladdening the mind for immersion. …”

SN.34.5. Samādhimūlakaārammaṇasutta (“Supports For Immersion”)
